name: FRigUnit_TransformConstraintPerItem
doc: Constrains an item's transform to multiple items' transforms

BaseTransform: Transform op option. Use if ETransformSpace is BaseTransform
BaseItem: Transform op option. Use if ETransformSpace is BaseJoint
bUseInitialTransforms: If checked the initial transform will be used for the constraint data
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
